name: All your links â€¢ makers.so template
description:
This is actually a fully responsive site. Preview it here: https://links.makers.so


Links is a ready to use makers.so template. Makers is a Figma Plugin to go from Figma to site with one click. 


Simply duplicate this file, install makers and turn it into a site with only one click. Then, tweak the design, make it your own and publish to your own custom domain.
